java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError

(1) Why no error dialog
(2) Should we attempt the hot swap if we know it will fail? (Could we have

1. There is no error dialog because there is no error. I've debugged the JDWP
class redefinition call and the VM does *not* complain. It returns error code 0,
which means there was no problem. This behavior is a feature (bug) of the VM.

2. The JDI granularity for HCR support is as follows:

- Does not support HCR
- Supports HCR
-- Can redefine classes without restriction
-- Cannot redefine classes without restriction
-- Can add methods
-- Cannot add methods

Given this information, we can't detect that the VM won't succeed with your example.

Thanks to the fix for Bug 8013, the user is now informed that the top stack
frame is obsolete in this test case.

This is as fixed as possible.
